original_text: The fourth captain for the fourth month was Asahel the brother of Joab, and Zebadiah his son after him: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
korean_text: 넷째 달 넷째 지휘관은 요압의 아우 아사헬이요 그 다음은 그의 아들 스바댜이니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: The fourth captain for the fourth month
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 달의 네 번째 대장은

sentences.original_text: was Asahel the brother of Joab
and Zebadiah his son after him:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 뒤를 이은 그의 아들 스바댜였으며
